sourcesContent: import{jsx as r,Fragment as i}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{translate as o}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{useAuthenticator as t}from"../hooks/useAuthenticator/index.js";import{Alert as e}from"../../../primitives/Alert/Alert.js";const s=()=>{const{error:s}=t((r=>[r.error]));return r(i,{children:s?r(e,Object.assign({variation:"error",isDismissible:!0},{children:o(s)})):null})};export{s as RemoteErrorMessage};
